events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your qualifications carefully.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department. We are matching your skills to the job requirements.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the upcoming stages of the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening based on your resume and background. Everything looks promising, and we are moving forward with your application.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening questions. Your answers help us better understand your fit for the Software Engineer role.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our engineering team for May 10th at 10:00 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
Your technical interview has been completed. The interviewers appreciated your problem-solving skills and coding knowledge.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 3:00 PM UTC. This will focus on company culture fit and your career aspirations.
The HR interview was successfully completed. Our team believes you are a great match for our Engineering team and company values.
An official offer for the Software Engineer position has been sent to you, detailing compensation, benefits, and role expectations.
We have received your positive feedback regarding the job offer, expressing enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
Thank you for accepting our job offer. We are excited to welcome you aboard as a new Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has started. You will receive all necessary resources and support to begin your journey with our engineering team.
The hiring process is now officially closed. We are pleased to have you as part of our engineering department and look forward to your contributions.
